title: Collaborative Reflective Training Model Design for Teacher Professional Transformation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Participants experience collaborative and reflective thinking through team-based projects and online discussions, including analysis of real-world educational implementation cases

learning_goals: They can develop two or more lesson designs using a collaborative learning design model.
They can perform peer feedback three or more times and propose improvements by applying a reflective practice framework.
They can explain three or more instructional strategies based on the Understanding by Design (UbD) approach.
They can resolve time management issues in team-based problem-solving processes using two or more methods.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
